series.title: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: Ougon no Kaze

episodes.note: Dope. Giovanna is cool. Bruno is cool. The setting is great, and golden experience is a sick power.
Dope fight. Both of them have crazy powerful abilities.
Difficult task. The arrow returns!
Great way to finish off Polpo. Giorno just gets better and better. Might be my favourite Jojo protagonist.
Great introduction of the gang. I guess we'll come back to the old ladies story later. Mista is cool, Abbachio too.
Abbachio backstory. Solving the mystery with Bucciarati
Dance scene! Sex Pistols! Giorno Giovanna has a dream!
Great backstory. I am hoping for better fights though...mista's power wasn't used in an all that interesting way.
Narancia losing his shit all the time. Trish introduced. Bucciarati become a capo.
Poor Gelato and Sorbet, they got fucked up! Narancia's power is pretty cool.
I'm liking Naracia now. Bucciarati comes off as a great saviour in these guys backstories.
Fugo backstory and stand. Abbachio putting Giorno in his place...unsuccessfully
That's not how immunisation works...right? Either way it was cool.
Mista gotta act fast!
DOPE. Grateful dead sneaking, Sex Pistols saving Mista, and Bucciarati saving the crew
Bucciarati! The resolve! The Sticky Fingers! 9 might be slightly generous
Weird power that BabyFace...I like that stand powers can "evolve" just by figuring out unique ways of using them
Melone defeated. Poor Pericolo. Ice boy seems unstoppable! Going into the water seems like a bad idea - he'll freeze it right?
FFS. Can Mista go 1 fight without shooting himself?! Haha. Crazy fight.
BRUUUUNNNOOOOOO! Is he dead?! Is he dead?! Save him Giorno!
Bruno survived the donutting....but he was dead. Giorno saw him die. Then he was alive again! I suspect it'll turn out Bruno is dead.
New enemies already! So focus on Narancia!
Narancia won out in the end. I do think it sill that the gang didn't follow and help Narancia though. Also how is Giorno even alive hhaha
A post-death stand ability is new. Trish front and center stage for this arc.
Trish is dope. Looks like the boss is taking action!
The boss revealed! Doppio/Boss is cool. Jojo villains are always amazing.
Risotto is so fucking cool. Shame he had to get killed off so cheap
RIP ABBACCHIO. Brutal. At least he was able to leave a "dying message"
Cool characters, interesting setup. The "make people laugh" thing is the only detraction...but maybe they can make it interesting.
Kidnapped...and they're just working with the "kill squad" like that?
The laugh attack thing is old already. Hopefull Masaru can stick with this non-cry baby attitude
What the fuck was that? You can't be fucking serious. The show could go rapidly down (or up) hill from here
Tone shift from the last arc - looks like we'll be getting some circus episodes?. Ahhh! They didn't have the balls to kill him off for real.
Glad they didn't leave us hanging about Narumi.
Vilma's cool. I'm still wondering what Narumi is suppose to be doing (going forward)
I liked Olympia's design.
Back story of the Aqua Vita creator. Pretty cool. Have to say though predicted the brothers would fight - but over a woman? Really?
End of the backstory of the Aqua Vita, Puppets, and shirogane's.
Narumi and the Shirogane's attack the midnight circus.
Narumi's reasoning is lame, but he had a cool moment. This Midnight Circus arc is going very quick.
Shirogane's and Four strongest dropping like flies. Lucille was dope, shame they killed her off.
Reunion and plot twist. Not the greatest thing
We're back with Masaru...and the story is taking a bizarre turn. I'm not into at the moment.
Another backstory of immortal people who all look alike.
The backstory is getting quite convoluted now. We saw Shirogane/Elenore's birth!
So did Francine die? I feel like there are some plot holes around Guy and Francine having met at this time?
Hmm.. it's beginning to make some sort of sense now I guess. It is quite convoluted though
Wait...so those guys are the same person? Then did he fake his death each time? What?
A lot of buildup stuff. Shirogane RED DRESS!
Lot of wasted time here. Could be a good fight with Pantalone though?
George and Ashihana seem to be out of it
Pantalone siding with the humans is pretty cool. I like his character arc so far.
Coloubine's personality is cool. I'm not struck of the makeover she received. Why make her a loli? Why not keep her in an adult sized body?
The only thing I enjoyed was Elenore in the dress. The show has lost the spark it had early on
Minus points for the retarded space station thing. Bonus points for the psychological mind fuck of having "two bodies"
The way Masaru was saved was quite smart I guess. Columbine with the save! RIP Just as she was getting good.
Hmm. interesting bunch of characters.
This guy's a savage...getting people in their weaknesses
Was that a Jojo REFERENCE!? Also that kid was losing to a butterfly!? Hahahhaa
Prince beat the butterfly! They got rival(s) now.
The teams coming together
Looks like they've got everyone on board now?.. Hopefully serious running can start now

Kakeru's spiralling into the abyss of cuntery
The gang getting closer - but Haiji collapsed!?
Kakeru helping Ouji was cool. He's beginning to change.

Build up episode.

Touma's self righteous BS reigns above all. Again the villain is pitifully weak when thier "best move/master plan" doesnt work
Poor outing. Worst series yet of index/railgun. Accelerator acsended to angel level - and did nothing. Lame.
I liked yhe hinami/Toka/Akira meeting

CCG and Ghouls working together. The Kagune drones are spawning.

End to all the side fights, just the lunatic to go

Stories weren't that great this week.
More of the usual.
Beach episode averted?! Yukata feastival episodes are night
Toned down episode.
School festival and a vampire hunter
Halloween and Chirstmas in the same episode. The shows starting to decline in my opinion.
CGDCT continues. The styrofoam cover at the end was jokes
Nice show overal, it was slowly becoming mudance though. Could have been a 6
Owl man will help loser MC regain his archery ability...probably
Hmm..I guess they had to get him back into archery quick - glad they didn't drag it out. Hopefully we'll contine to see Masa

Team building/bonding for the guys

Helping Masa make a decision...but no archery. Masa only then goes and gets in a car accident!!

Nice ending. Good show.
Funny, but could get old quick

It's strange. I thought the maid's loli fetish would have gotten old by now, but somehow they're still making it funny.

More pervy maids!

Sleepover!! Kamoi covering for the kids, what a champ.
No laughs but feels for the finale. Good show.

series.title: Ulysses: Jehanne Darc to Renkin no Kishi

episodes.note: Can't say I'm happy with the episode. Fingers crossed it improves
"Milk cow" knight is hot.
I don't like the "berserker mode" gimic. Alchemy boy is waste - why is he longing out escaping the dungeon?
Turns out Momorancy is Gilles de Rais. Should've known...Gille had to appear somewhere
Noire was wayy better than Jehanne. She's the character we need. Well they're both dead now.
Some stupid shit about banging a prisoner girl...but our MC is too "goody goody" to hit the desperate loli
That was a shit hiding place for the scabbard. Jehanne revived.
What even is this anymore?
...well the shows gone fulltard.
Waste episode. Jehanne is just lame. The other Ulysses is 10 times the character
What a god awful show. The best bit was the Noire Ulysses - when she was full helmed.

Cool. They're growing closer much quicker than other yuri shows

Not a bad episode. I wasn't bored at least
